Ingredients.3: 1 pound vegan meatless grounds (such as Smart Ground® or Yves®)

Ingredients.5: 3 tablespoons brown sugar, or more to taste

Ingredients.8: 1 teaspoon dried dill weed, or to taste

Ingredients.9: 1 freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and cook until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes. Add meatless grounds and break up the clumps with a spoon until crumbly. Cook until browned and heated through, about 5 minutes.

Directions.2: Reduce heat to low. Add ketchup, brown sugar, apple cider vinegar, ground mustard, dill, and pepper. Mix well, cover, and let simmer until heated through, 3 to 4 minutes. Adjust seasonings if necessary.
